name: green fritters
steps: In a large bowl, mix the flour, water, salt, pepper, garlic powder, onion powder, paprika, cumin, coriander, turmeric, baking powder, baking soda, apple cider vinegar, and olive oil.
Add the green peas, spinach, and kale to the bowl and mix well.
Heat a large skillet over medium heat and add a little bit of olive oil.
Scoop the fritter mixture into the skillet and cook for 3-4 minutes on each side, or until golden brown.
Serve the fritters with your favorite dipping sauce and enjoy!
